snippet: Knicks Coach Mike Woodson forgot to play Chris Copeland in the first half of Saturday's preseason game against Boston, but Copeland then scored 21 points in 19 minutes.
abstract: Knicks Coach Mike Woodson forgot to play Chris Copeland in the first half of Saturday's preseason game against Boston, but Copeland then scored 21 points in 19 minutes.

headline.main: Knicks' Copeland Stands Out After Entrance Is Put Off
